website_summaries.verdict: A basic, low-priced case that provides reliable protection while allowing the look of your phone to show through.
pros: Made of flexible, transparent TPU that provides shock-resistant protection in a slim design
cons: Covers phone's buttons, requiring extra pressure to push them
Some reports of yellow tint over time

customer_reviews.title: Would buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my IPhone 8 and it fit perfectly! It came on time and the product had no scratches or any defects. It doesn’t suction the iPhone like other cases does so that’s a big plus! It has a small bump on the front so if it falls it has some protection, but I would still put a screen protector on because mine has fallen and I’ve still broke the screen protector. Looks great and would buy again! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for my wife and liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my wife and liked it so much, I decided to get one for myself. The material on the bumper portion of the phone is a little softer, giving the phone more protection when it falls. The case is stylish because it shows off the phone instead of showing off the case due to the transparent case material. The price was right as well, great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for what I want. I didn't want something huge and bulky, and I wanted it to still be see-through. After all, half of the appeal of the iPhone is that is is a beautiful design. This fits like a glove on my iPhone 8, and I really like the blue tint. The corners seem like they will definitely protect it from a fall, but are unobtrusive enough that they don't get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: AdamOndi

customer_reviews.title: I love my case
customer_reviews.text: I love my case! It is lightweight and I love how it compliments my rose color Iphone 7. It is a smooth plastic and it protects very well. It has full coverage around all edges of the phone so I am not concerned about the phone if I was to drop it. I have no desire to get another case anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: I bought this case twice!
customer_reviews.text: Like many clear rubbery cases, this case does yellow over time, which is why I bought a second one to replace the old one. Other than the yellowing over time, I really enjoy this case. It provides good support for my phone. I dropped my phone several times with this on and it barely had any scratches. Out of all the clear cases that I’ve had this one is definitely my favorite because it feels the most supportive for my phone. Just wished that it doesn’t yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Lanilyn

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for this iPhone 7 clear case.
customer_reviews.text: Great case that hugs the iPhone 7 nicely and shows off the red color I chose for me and the rose color for my wife. It also feels great in our hands and is grippy. 5 stars for this baby! Buy it today and let people see the color of your phone that you paid good money for.
customer_reviews.author: WIlliam R.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Here's the honest review you're looking for. Item was just as described. The case is kinda thick but not too thick. It doesn't cover the edges or sides of the phone screen so I would recommend buying a screen protector in addition to it as I did. But most importantly the case shows the beauty of your phone really well and it looks really good on my product red iPhone 8😍. Would definitely recommend 💯💯
customer_reviews.author: Britney Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case!
customer_reviews.text: The case is soft which I didn’t expect, but I like the bumpers around each corner. It’s a thin so I’m not sure how durable it’ll be, but so far it feels good. There’s also a texture throughout the back of the phone that prevents any bubbles from showing, which I love. Overall good case :)
customer_reviews.author: Justine!

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great choice and value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased clear case for 2020 iPhone SE Red. Fits well Should do a great job protecting the phone. Easy to hold. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: John Kuwik

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable, but Works O.K
customer_reviews.text: Update as of 9/9/2020 My son dropped his phone and it offered no protection for the screen protector. It shattered from a face fall and without the screen protector his screen would of been damaged. Keep this in mind as it doesn’t offer enough of a lip to protect the most important part of your phone; the display. ———————————- It works for what it is, and should protect the phone from a drop on a corner. It’s just not very comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Strobeck

customer_reviews.title: feels good, and very clear
customer_reviews.text: I like using a clear case so I can slide my train pass inside it and show it to the conductor without fumbling for my wallet. My last case had yellowed over a couple of years so I replaced it with this one. It's a bit larger than the last one but it looks great and feels good in my hand. The price is fair. If it yellows quickly, I'll come back here to report, but so far it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Neurasthenic

customer_reviews.title: Really good, almost great case
customer_reviews.text: I ditched my AmazonBasics clear case (which stuck to my phone in a gross-looking way) for this one and it’s definitely better, but not perfect. Fits really well, and I’m comforted by the extra corner protection, but the buttons (or button covers) are too stiff and hard to press. Also, while it doesn’t stick to the back like a lot of other clear cases (apparently thanks to a very discreet dot/bump pattern), it does present some subtle psychedelic moiré patterns on the back, which are... weird. So alas my search for the perfect clear case continues...
customer_reviews.author: Robogeek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, simple, effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect case for me. I bought this phone case as an attempt to make my 2 year old phone look fancy again and hopefully stretch another 2 years (phone is paid off) The case looks great paired with my white iPhone. I’m on a pink / rose gold kick right now, so this case looks great with my rose gold Bose headphones, rose gold case, holder, phone stand etc. paired with a peel and stick screen protector, my phone has been dropped many times, and not a scratch. I love this case and will look for something very similar when the time comes to upgrade my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone case I got the clear one to use with my new red iPhone and I love seeing the color. Haven't dropped it yet *knock on wood* so I'm not sure how protective it is, but it looks and feels great. I put some pop sockets on the back to wrap my earbuds around and now it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tada

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised (Revised)
customer_reviews.text: you can find this same case for $2 to $3 less but I bought this one because I read on the description page in the 2nd picture from the top "crystal clear case, Scratch-resistant, Camera protection,& " Explosion-Proof Screen Protector"... BEWARE there is NO SCREEN PROTECTOR with this case... Update: The company told me they updated the 2nd picture and are sending me a screen protector. So I'm giving them 3 stars instead of my original 1 star. I would give them 4 stars But it took them 4 weeks to get back to me! I had to buy a screen protector in the mean time. I do appreciate that they contacted me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bowhunta

customer_reviews.title: Great Clear Case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my Apple iPhone in gold and I like being able to SEE my phone. This 'crystal clear, shock absorption case' with good, soft bumpers is perfect for me. It adds no weight to the phone yet it feels softly, solidly secure in your hand. I know photos are helpful but I haven't figured out yet how to take a photo of my phone with my phone. My phone looks like the one in the ad only mine is gold; not rose. Phone fits right into the case with zero struggle and yet is instantly secure. Great case; IS exactly what I wanted and hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I am not getting a free case for this review lol. I actually love this case and I will probably never go to another one I buy this case for my family’s phones because I have NEVER had a problem with it my 4 year old uses my phone and drops it all the time inside and outside and never once has my phone broke in anyway. I absolutely love this case. The only downfall is that after a while they turn yellow but it’s clear so that’s to be expected so when that happens I order a new one!! I would recommend this case to anyone who wants to keep their phone protected.
customer_reviews.author: thomas ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Bought it more than once because it is that good
customer_reviews.text: This case is better than any other I have bought. I have gotten so many different cases throughout the years but this one is the best. I am famous for breaking my screen and have not broken it once since I started using this case. It is easy to clean, stylish, and really protects my phone. I would use it with a pop-socket if you are clumsy like I am but you really don't need it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be cheap quality but it’s actually pretty dense and can protect my phone when I drop it. The corners are thicker so if you drop it and it hits the corner, it won’t dent your phone.
customer_reviews.author: jmarambula

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2020 SE
customer_reviews.text: Fits our new 2020 SE perfectly. Just got it so can’t speak to durability or if it will stay clear. Probably not for anyone too hard on their phone but we like that it’s not too thick and has a good hand-feel.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Dirties easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my iphone 7 and I like the fact that it's a clear case so if I wanted to put a polaroid picture in the back I could. However, for the price I thought that the quality didn't match because it got dirty after a couple weeks of use. My case would turn yellow and collect a good amount of dust. I tend to keep my stuff fairly clean so it was a little concerning. The case isn't as durable either in my opinion because it's pretty flexible rather than your hard case cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good. Not so clicky buttons
customer_reviews.text: If you want to show your phone and protect at the same time, this is good option. It's neither very soft not very hard. Looks pretty good at the edges. The design gives a sense of security in terms of protection. It attracts litlle bit fingerprint, but not that much. Easy access for the charging port, good opening for speakers . One downside, the volume buttons are NOT that much clucky, have to press hard to make these work.
customer_reviews.author: SA Masum

customer_reviews.title: Not for clumsy people or kids.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work just fine, it isn’t bulky in your pocket, it grips well in your hand and doesn’t hang up when you slip it in your pocket. However it is on the lighter duty of phone cases, so if you are a clumsy, accident prone or if it’s for a child, I would recommend you spend some money and get a heavier case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: For the price point I was expecting a cheap product. But I found it to be very well made. It is flexible and easy to put on the phone. The extra bumpers on the corners are a comfort and add additional drop protection. I got tired a big bulky cell phone cases, this is easy to slide in and out of purse/pocket and it is much easier to hold in one hand. I have only used it a few days, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: rita woods

customer_reviews.title: Thin yet it protects
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Matone Crystal Clear case. I have one on my iPhone 8+. When my wife got a new iPhone 7 she just had to have one like mine. She really the Rose Gold showing through.
customer_reviews.author: John Scogin

customer_reviews.title: clear case, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: i liked this phone case. it lasted for about a year before the clear color slowly yellowed from the sun. i would order this again in the future because i like that i can see the color of my phone. i dropped my phone with this case on a few times. it protected the phone well against scratches, etc
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case. Excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Such a great - protective case that is very affordable. Seriously - I am sure this will last for at least 6 months!!! It's raised enough to not let the glass touch the surface etc. It is flexible and the bumpers are great on the sides. BEST PART - the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Joy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The Clear color is like a Glass Finish, Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on mu iPhone 8 and I like that this will also fit to the new iPhone SE, I got the clear color, it has the pumps on the corners for more protection Hopefully will not Yellow out after sometime
customer_reviews.author: Taha

customer_reviews.title: The best iPhone case.
customer_reviews.text: My case that I purchased at the iPhone store was literally falling apart. I didn't want to pay an outrageous price for another one so thought I'd try this. It is fantastic. Much better protection than the old case. My husband liked it so much he had me purchase one for his phone also. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these cases for my new 2020 iPhone SE's and they offer decent protection - especially for the price. The case is comfortable to hold and has a fair amount of padding on the edges to protect it from drops. It is also light and not so big that it is awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Really protects your phone.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case so much I’ve actually bought three of them for my family. It is durable and protect your phone from damage. And your phone still looks good with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo R.

customer_reviews.title: Best case!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second case for my iPhone 6. I purchased this same case about 2 years ago and his not failed me or my phone. The clear silicone became a bit hazy so I got a new one today. Super fast delivery, great packaging with a coupon inside. I’ve dropped my iPhone on tile floors, cement and my driveway and this little case protected my iPhone like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it was worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the back of the case would be hard plastic and the edges and sides would be the flexible material like my last case, but the whole case is that material. It fits my iPhone 8 fine, but there are 2 small holes on the bottom left side and I don't know why. Also there are a few spots on the case where the plastic messed up. I think it would be worth like $4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Nice, crystal clear, flexible plastic material, all buttons work, and all cut outs are properly spaced. I like the extra thickness on the corners- makes me feel better protected. I’m using it on my iPhone SE, which is externally a twin to the iPhone 6. My last clear case ( from another manufacturer) yellowed over time, but I’m hoping this won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for a few months now and have dropped my phone a few time thank god for the protective glass screen protector but my phone isn’t chipped or broke but the screen protector just cracked for the first time and I have maybe dropped my phone 5-8 times so it’s a pretty good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brian b.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: This case is wonderfully clear and shows off the color of my red phone. I enjoy the slim feel. It is not rubbery but offers a great grip on my hand. It offers 360 protection from drops. I give it four stars because I haven’t dropped my phone yet. If I do and it survives I’ll update it with five stars
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple case.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these over the years (from various sellers), and it's my favorite case. We use older version iphones, and these simple cases are a good fit, super clear, and they do a nice job of protecting the phone. We also use the tempered glass protectors as well.
customer_reviews.author: LD Adams

customer_reviews.title: Hard Pass
customer_reviews.text: Well it has protected my phone well enough. But it turns yellow really quickly. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie R

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay clear, turns yellow
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - after receiving my new one it has again turned yellow. It is just the nature of the product the seller was good the case does protect well. Having tried several different brand clear cases they all turn yellow. .. I have had this case for about 6 weeks, it has already turned yellow. The seller has reached out to me an offered a new one. I will update at a later date if this one yellows or stays clear.
customer_reviews.author: Squeak

customer_reviews.title: Clear Case with Good Corner Bumpers - Not a hard plastic case
customer_reviews.text: This case is super easy to put on and I like the gel bumpers on the corners. Just an FYI though that the case is soft and not like a hard plastic case. I thought it might be a little thicker & tougher, but it's pretty basic. I still love it, but just so everyone knows.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice but doesn't provide much protection. The problem is that it is super flexible. The sides are so loose that I'm sure dust and debris will get under the edges in no time. I'm returning for a refund and will purchase something more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: shanti

customer_reviews.title: Great case, great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for Gramps' new phone, it fits the iPhone 7 perfect, got it for the extra cushion on the corners. I have a case jus like this for my iPhone 11 and love it, saved it many times... highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: EJWTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A very good clear case with corner bumps
customer_reviews.text: The case is very nice, it is clear and has bumps on corners. However I would like the bumps stick out little bit more on front side for better protection.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. Very clear, sturdy, and attractive. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dow

customer_reviews.title: Not CRYSTAL clear but great case
customer_reviews.text: This case would easily get 5 stars if the description had not said “crystal clear.” Absolutely love this case - I’m able to showcase my phone while feeling secure. I’ve dropped it a number of times & have been thankful for the little bumpers in the corners & the raised edges. I’ve also attached a pop socket to it & it sticks very well. Case itself is truly 5/5 especially for its price. -1 for inaccurate description.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit the iPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her iPhone 8 Plus as advertised. It didn’t fit the phone so I had to return it. It was a shame because I liked the quality. Seemed more durable than others.
customer_reviews.author: WingMan69

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first I was really satisfied with this clear case. But a week passed by and it began to change color. It basically looks dirty because it turned gray. However it does protect your phone and most importantly your screen. But overall I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My wife's iPhone 7 was in need of a new case and I mistakenly purchased the Plus case without realizing it. After the order, Matone had emailed me making sure that the Plus case was what I wanted. After a couple of emails, they offered me a 20% off redemption code for the standard case and I kept the Plus to use on my phone. The case seems well built for its intended purpose and my wife commented that it looks like a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: MyMonyPit

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Light great on black phone leaves ugly bubble ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Light great on black phone leaves ugly bubble marks on the back (but I don't care), while the Rose gold on my wife's white/pink phone leaves no bubbles at all and looks great (she's happy). We've both dropped them a few times now with no breaks!
customer_reviews.author: sduwe

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you handle your phone gently
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my iPhone 8, which fits perfectly by the way. I’m not really prone to dropping my phone a lot so I think a lightweight case like this is perfect for me. However, I did drop it hard once and it gave a very unnoticeable chip on the bottom of my phone even with the case on. So, if you’re accident-prone, maybe opt for a heavier case. But if you treat your phone nicely, this is a five-star case.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Gomes

customer_reviews.title: absolutely LOVE this case!!
customer_reviews.text: this case is exactly my aesthetic!! i love the clear sleek designs , but also the awesome protection from the corner bumpers. My phone literally NEVER EVER took damage with this case like it is the hulk in a case. i dropped it from my hand to all the way from the top of bleachers and i never even faced a scratch!!!!! really recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Saj

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister's phone since she just bought it and she loves it. Fits perfectly and didn't break when she accidentally dropped her phone. She also put a picture on he back of her phone so she can see it. Definitely reccomend this if you are looking for something simple!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Eddins

customer_reviews.title: Volume button failed...too stiff
customer_reviews.text: The volume buttons are too stiff. Too solid!!! I like the design like many other bumper cases. The areas where it should be delicate are the buttons, and its hard and requires A lot of effort to press.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin of San Jose

customer_reviews.title: Keeps apple iphone looking good!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Matone clear case for an iphone7 today. It fits beautifully and feels nice in hand. I also want to give a shout out to their customer service. I ordered the wrong size (my mistake). When I got in touch with Matone to find out how I could return it and get a refund they said to just pass it on to someone who could use it rather than pay to ship it back to them. They also gave 20% promo when I ordered the correct size. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Abe 2

customer_reviews.title: Flexible yet secure and clear to see iphone's beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my daughter and my mom. Both love it so they can showcase their iphone 8's new beautiful color. This cas is thin enough yet secures the iphone with additional corner bumpers and its clear. Its still flexible yet harder than most making this a great phone case.
customer_reviews.author: K. Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, looks lousy
customer_reviews.text: The case protects my phone all right, but I’ve had it about 9 months and it is no longer clear. It is turning gray, and no matter how carefully I clean it the back makes my bright red phone look dingy and spotty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I’ve dropped my phone a few times and haven’t had any damage. I like that it’s clear so I can see my red phone. It does start to yellow after a little while. The material is pretty slip-resistant so it’s easy to hold and doesn’t slide on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: awiste

customer_reviews.title: Great case great price
customer_reviews.text: Well-reinforced clear case that allows the iphone to have a natural look. Corners are sturdy and stick out a bit above the screen so it will protect it better from a fall.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, quality product, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I really love this case, I have had mine since September 2017 and it still looks brand new with no discoloration. I've been a little clumsy an have dropped my phone with no damage to my phone. I like it so much I got one for my son when we upgraded his phone - we were still in the store when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want to use the button on the phone, this case can’t help you
customer_reviews.text: Unless I missed something I didn’t think the case/ cover was supposed to cover the same button on the phone that you either press and then punch in your code- or use to unlock the phone with your fingerprint This case totally covered that button
customer_reviews.author: Nails

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: In the past 5 years, I have bought two of these phone cases for my cellphone. I really enjoy the clear look on my phone, and it is really nice for displaying stickers on the back of my phone that stay protected underneath the case. The only issue is the plastic will slowly yellow over a few years due to things like heat, sunlight, skin oils, etc... Even so, the cheap price for a pretty nice case makes it worthwhile!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I bought this clear case for my iPhone 7 since there were so many to choose from. So far this one is working out well in the short time I’ve had it. Exactly what I needed for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product - for a 11 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 11 yr old boy! This product seems like a solid hard case, no swell, and fit perfectly well for his SE phone. I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: mom_of_2

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved it! He likes that he can change out the background of his phone now. Nice thickness, nice protection.
customer_reviews.author: Desi & Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Good option for a budget screen protector. Fits the iPhone 8 perfectly. It’s clear and rubbery and fits it slim so the phone still feels nice to hold without being bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon1977

customer_reviews.title: Seems perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with a new phone. I loved the color and wanted a clear case that would show it off. I also wanted a case that would make my grasp on the new, thinner phone more secure. It's too soon to know if the case will hold up to my clumsiness, but so far I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Smart and simple design!
customer_reviews.text: The case is crystal clear, allowing me to slip my ID in the back and have it visible. The corner bumper guards keep the screen from hitting the floor if I should drop the phone.
customer_reviews.author: nano

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The case is very flimsy and doesn’t provide any significant protection on the corners. In addition, the face of the iPhone is much more exposed. You get what you pay for. I am going back to the otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Lucychas

customer_reviews.title: Clear case
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves the rose gold case on her gold iPhone 7. She happy for her screen protector. Shhhh!! Maybe this time around, she won’t damage the screen this time around. Now that the phone is semi protected all the way around. I figured a 12yr old would love, only because you still can see a lot of the phone (front and back). Other than that. Thank you amazon and staff.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Pommells Jr

customer_reviews.title: Working as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this item for iPhone 7. It is made of a flexible rubber and clear. Fits the phone snug. I would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Summerhouse

customer_reviews.title: Simple and light, not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's very simple and you can put a picture in the back and change it up from time to time. Plus you can't beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.text: When my last case broke, I bought this for protection until I found another case I really liked. However, this case is seriously durable and actually looks quite cute and trendy- and you can interchangeably put photos in the back! I’ve definitely dropped my phone a few times since getting this case but it’s really solidly protective without being too heavy or too firm and I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: VMeds

customer_reviews.title: Like to clear look
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put on but it is a little difficult to push the side buttons on the phone now. I do like the clear look and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: T.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great design and protection for phone
customer_reviews.text: The over all design of the case not only protects it very well with its raised corner bumper guards, and its raised edges that protects the screen, but also shows the color and sleek design of the phone with the clearness of the tpu material. Easy to place over the phone and allows for great handling of the phone. You get a good grip on the phone and doesnt feel like it will slip out of the hand. I recommend this type of case to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Juniior

customer_reviews.title: Love the clear look
customer_reviews.text: Loved that this one looked like my old iPhone 6 Omaker. The bumpers were a must. These are a bit more rigid, which I’m not sure yet or this is good or bad, but I hope they hold up as well as my Omaker. Overall I love the look and it feels well built.
customer_reviews.author: CrzRani

customer_reviews.title: Clear Grey
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend ordered the clear blue and he didn't like it. I wrote a review explaining why we didn't like it. A few days later, I received an email apologizing that we were unsatisfied and asking if we wanted a new case. We ordered another one in clear light grey and it just came a few days ago and we absolutely love it. It fits great, looks great and is the perfect color. Thanks for the great service!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Passed all of my inadvertent drop tests
customer_reviews.text: This was my second type of case like this and it was better than any case that cost five times as much. I have dropped my phone countless times... Even at work between the gap of the plane and jetway down to the ramp. Not a scratch or crack to be seen!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Cute case. I wanted something a little thinner than my Otterbox and this does the job well. I appreciate the protection around the cameras as well. For the price isn’t not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cherita

customer_reviews.title: Not clear
customer_reviews.text: This case is not clear, it makes my black iPhone look like a ashy blue. I don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Perrionna Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Best case for the frequent phone dropper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone case January of 2018 (18 months ago) It’s amazing. Because I’m pretty clumsy/always rushing, I’ve dropped my phone constantly (at least once a day) and never had a screen protector- just this case. This case never let me down. My husband and daughter use Otterboxes but this one works just as great. I’m currently looking for this case for iPhone X for my new phone...
customer_reviews.author: Jamal T.

customer_reviews.title: Matone replaced my case immediately!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was not supposed to turn yellow. I’ve used daily for 3 months and it’s as yellow as it can be.******update******* customer service saw this review and immediately offered to ship a new case! I’m very impressed and will update again after I’ve used it for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dawson

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far :) I love the look of my iPhone and hate cases that deter from that so I'm very happy with this one. Will update with more time to see if the case becomes yellow or deteriorates however after a few weeks I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute case!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this case! It’s simple so the color of my phone can show through! It does protect your phone from cracks, but I always recommend getting a glass screen protector with any case.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Durable, functional, and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Really good case. Obviously don’t drop it from a A very high height but either a glass screen protector you’re fine. Simple durable design, no issues with the button mechanisms. My last clear case turned yellow and that was about forty dollars, this shoes bo sign of color change yet and had it for months. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Damschroder

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I got it and it was clear. One week later it kind of turned yellow. Now my rose gold phone looks more gold. It’s fine and I can deal with it but it does not stay clear for long
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cases, one for myself and then I bought one for my brother after the second case came. I drop my phone a bit and so far the case has stayed sturdy. I bought the clear case because I wanted to see a sticker I put on the phone itself. It's easy for me to press the right side button to turn the screen on and off but sometimes I feel like I have to press a little harder for the volume buttons. It's a good case considering I almost dropped 30 dollars for one at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have the iPhone SE 2020 and it fits perfectly. Looks great on black too! I thought it would be a little brighter but its more of a “dirty” pink, which I’m fine with. The corners are slightly lifted to protect the camera from touching surfaces. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a case that doesn’t feel too bulky but does a good job at protecting your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mapes

customer_reviews.title: Decent Case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blue case for my iPhone 8 black phone. I like that this is clear and the black shows thru. It was easy enough to put on, the gripe on this is good, can't speak on durability at this point. Alignment of volume, etc is spot on. Looks and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: stags

customer_reviews.title: fits great
customer_reviews.text: clear case fits our iPhone 8 like a glove clear sleek design. great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my daughters wants and needs. Slim yet the corners are thicker to protect better against drops.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: iPhone protection
customer_reviews.text: This protective case for the iPhone fits it well and may save it from occasional clumsy mishaps. :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paris

customer_reviews.title: My kid is so in love with this case that she even make me come ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid is so in love with this case that she even make me come see it even that I bought it haha, hey what I do like the most it work great with the Just Wireless QI wireless charger pad, so no need to connect your iphone to the charger just leave it in your pad
customer_reviews.author: obaquerizo

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Simple, but great. Good feel. Fits perfectly around the phone. Has held up well. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: oioi123

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this case for the 3rd time and I’m happy with it every time. The only issue would be that it gets dirty very easily. I can’t complain too much since it’s expected with a clear case. For comparison the picture is my case after 4 months and my new case.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Love the blue tint!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these cases because they work. The extra bumpers on the corners have saved me from many drops in the last few years. I just bought this blue tinted case for my son’s silver iPhone 8 and it looks soooo cool!! VERY happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: NoFreeTime

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. Only had a couple days so far so time will tell but I think it will protect just fine. Seems to have well padded corners for drops
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and provides good protection!
customer_reviews.text: This case fits great and provides good protection without sacrificing showing off the color of the phone!
customer_reviews.author: TODD

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This case is exactly what I needed...protection for my iPhone SE Without being bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone in the house from counter height and no damage happened. But, my daughter dropped her’s on the sidewalk when skateboarding and crack the corner of the screen. Going to have to replace the screen to get it to work right. I need a better shock absorbing case for her.
customer_reviews.author: meltonio

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the cover and reports that it looks great and works very well. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: for iPhone SE 2020 Case, for iPhone 7 Case, for iPhone 8 Case, Matone Crystal Clear Shock Absorption Technology Bumper Soft TPU Cover Case for iPhone SE(2nd Generation)/iPhone 7/iPhone 8 - Clear
product_meta.description: Color:ClearNote: This case is perfect compatible with apple iPhone 7.Matone strives in providing a quality item and an friendly customer service. We appreciate customers send us a message with order id: # And details instead of leaving a bad review. Matone series hybrid clear case for apple iPhone 7 4.7 inch 2016 release with anti-scratch protection feature to prevent your phone from being scratched or damage during regular use. Order it now, enjoy a perfect new case for your iPhone 7.
feature_bullets: [Compatible with Apple iPhone SE(2nd Gen)/7/8]: This Matone Clear Case perfectly fits your iPhone 7/iPhone 8/iPhone SE 2nd generation (2020 release) with precision cutouts for all buttons and ports. While featuring raised bezel to lift screen and camera off flat surface.
[Ultra clear hybrid case]: Clear TPU case is thin and lightweight for flexible durability. Clear View design of your iPhone 7/8/SE(2nd Generation) to preserve the natural, naked look.

[Shock Absorption TPU Bumper Cushion]: Corner bumpers protection for drops. Soft TPU materials offer maximum protection from bumps and hard-hits for the back and sides of your iPhone 7 & iPhone 8 & iPhone SE(2020).

[Scratch resistant]: This cover case for iPhone 7/8/SE(2nd Gen) is more endure scratches and scuff marks more than a regular case. Longer life and cleaner look for your iPhone 7, iPhone 8 or iPhone SE 2020.

[Nice grip & flexible]: Premium TPU material provides good grip for a slippery phone, and easy to get on and off with no worries about scratching your phone. (NOTE: this case is only for iPhone 7/8/SE2. If you are looking for a similar case for iPhone 7/8 Plus, you can also find it in MATONE.)
